   contain the root `toctree` directive.

zopyx.smashdocs - Python wrapper for Smashdocs API
==================================================

This module implements a Python 2/3 compatible wrapper for interacting
with the Smashdocs Partner API.

Contents:

   :maxdepth: 2

   README.rst
   usage.rst
   api.rst
   HISTORY.rst
